name: Cosmic Ray
components: V, S, M (a piece of meteorite)
text: You fling a ray of deadly cosmic energy at the target creature. If you succeed at a ranged touch attack with the ray, the target takes 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 20d6) and must make a Fortitude save. On a failed save, the target becomes sickened for 1 round per caster level and emits toxic cosmic energy for as long as it is sickened; any creature that comes within 5 feet of the affected target must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = spell’s DC) or become sickened for 1 round per 2 caster levels.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一块陨石)
duration_zh: 立即 和 1轮/等级; 见文本
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则部分生效; 见文本
text_zh: 你向目标生物射出一道致命的宇宙能量。如果你用这道射线成功一次远程接触攻击，目标受到1d6点/等级的伤害(最多20d6)并且必须做强韧豁免检定。如果豁免失败，目标变得恶心1轮/等级，并且只要他还在恶心，会散发出有毒的宇宙能量，任何在它5尺内的生物必须做一次强韧豁免检定(DC=此法术的DC)，不然也变得恶心1轮/2等级。
